me.prettyprint.hom
Class HectorObjectMapper

java.lang.Object
  me.prettyprint.hom.HectorObjectMapper
Type Parameters:
T - Type of object mapping to cassandra row
public class HectorObjectMapper
extends Object

Maps a slice of HColumns to an object's properties. See #createObject(Object, ColumnSlice) for more details.

As mentioned above all column names must be Strings - doesn't really make sense to have other types when mapping to object properties.

Author:
Todd Burruss

saveObjCollection

public Collection<?> saveObjCollection(me.prettyprint.hector.api.Keyspace keyspace,
                                       Collection<?> objColl)
Persists the object collection using a single batch mutate. It is up to the client to partition large collections appropriately so not to cause timeout or buffer overflow issues. The objects can be heterogenous (mapping to multiple column families, etc.)

Parameters:
keyspace -
objColl -
Returns:
